channel.title: How do you stop lag
channel.description:
hi,
recently i have made my server and everytime people log on and they have really bad lag.
anyone got any idea how to make it 100% free of lag,if you could help i would be very grateful
~THANKYOU~ Spanual :)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 09:52:54 AM[/size][hr]wont anyone help?

item.title: How do you stop lag
item.dc:creator: @kingstun kingstun
item.description:
@kingstun wrote:

you had make ur server anti-null then change the number of connections in server.java!!
